sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Accessible Electronic Information Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Accessible Electronic Information Act.

sections.heading: Legislative findings.  The Legislature finds and declares all of the following:
sections.text: Legislative findings. The Legislature finds and declares all of the following:

sections.heading: Definitions.  As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Accessible electronic information service program
sections.text: The Director by rule shall develop and implement a program of grants to qualified entities for the provision of accessible electronic information service to blind persons and persons with disabilities throughout Illinois. The grants shall be funded

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
